question: I have around the outside of my lips lots of bumps.  They appear like spots and change in size but never come to a head.  3 or 4 can merge together and although I have tried to squeeze them they are more like water blisters and there are so many in a cluster they never disappear.   Obviously, playing with them only makes the area sore but they are quite unsightly and I want to know how to get rid of them.  Is it anything to do with my age, coming up to 60.or a vitamin deficiency.   I do take medications for diabetes, cholesteral and blood pressure.  I also take vitamins for arthritis and ACE.
title: Water Blisters
